Details

A possessive resolver is a proxy to a main resolver that considers an object in scope if (a) it's in scope in the base resolver, or (b) the object is known to the actor. `class `**`PossessiveResolver`**` :   `[`ProxyResolver`](../object/ProxyResolver.html)
